Record.ClassificationPath: Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Acid-Base Imbalance/Alkalosis
Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Site or System/Cardiovascular System Finding/Fluid and Electrolyte Manifestation/Alkalosis
Record.Description: An abnormally high alkalinity (low hydrogen-ion concentration) of the blood and other body tissues.
A pathological condition that removes acid or adds base to the body fluids.
